Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1985...
Traded from Plum Grove to Bay City on 7/30/1985 (Going to PG: 1B W. Boydston. Going to BC: P C. Partida)...
Injured on 8/7/1986 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/7/1987 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Bay City to Plum Grove on 7/30/1988 (Going to BC: SS C. Wiggins. Going to PG: P C. Partida)...
Injured on 8/3/1989 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/28/1990...
Had first career hit on 6/8/1990, off Dennis Mcclung (TRO)...
Injured on 5/19/1991 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
